availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

creation.placeName: New York City, New York County, New York

body.p:
State of New York
City & County of New York S S

I. Edwin F. Corey Junior having been appointed a Commissioner for the State of Kentucky do solemnly swear that I will well and faithfully execute and perform all the duties of such commissioner with strict partiality and according to the best of my ability.

Edwin H. Corey Jun
Commissioner for the State of Kentucky in New York

Subscribed and Sworn to before me this 11th day of February A D 1863.
Danl Seixas
Commissioner for Kentucky
In New York

figure.ab:
SEIXAS
FOR THE STATE OF KENTUCKY
COMMISSIONER

EDWIN F. COREY JR.
FOR
KENTUCKY
COMMISSIONER
